title: Report, My feeling
body: I played the game 3 years, but I think the game have a big bug. When I enter in game,  I dont know why sometimes out, I dont understand. Noway?

replies.body: I'm having a little problem understanding exactly what's going on, but it kind of sounds like you keep getting disconnected from your games as soon as you enter them? If you can let me know a little more about what's going on I can do my best to help troubleshoot this with you!
